resource.name: All Applications to July 2008
resource.description: All applications received for LIHTC through July 31, 2008.  After this point, we switched to a different system to log applications.  Note that in 1994 all previous data was entered at one time into the system in use at the time.

resource.name: All Applications To July 2008
resource.description: All applications received for LIHTC through July 31, 2008.  After this point, we switched to a different system to log applications.  Note that in 1994 all previous data was entered at one time into the system in use at the time.

resource.name: Detroit Allocations by Number of Units
resource.description: All Reservations/Allocations (Awards) for projects whose applications were received through July 31, 2008, with the exception of some of the 4% deals

resource.description: All applications received for LIHTC from August 1, 2008 to the present.

resource.name: Michigan State Expenditures by Appropriation Unit
resource.description: Press Download then select visualization as image in order to download and print one of these cards as a visualization.  Access the API for programmatic access to the data.

resource.name: Michigan State Expenditures by Category
resource.description: Press Download then follow to visualize as image in order to download a visualization as an image. API takes you to documentation on how to build against this particular dataset.

resource.name: 4 % Reservations August 2008 to Present by LIHTC Amount Awarded
resource.description: All 4% Reservations/Allocations (Awards) issued from August 1, 2008 to the present.  Because of some of the technical aspects of how the projects work, and how the IRS determines an Allocation, it is possible that some of these projects could show up under the “old” and “new” data systems.
